name: Asteroid Storm 2
description:
My entry for OGA WGJ 2022. The graphics and audio in this game are almost entirely from OGA with a few exceptions which I drew myself. I went down the modify route using my entry for LowRezJam2021.

STORY

You play as the maintenance tech on a space station built on the surface of an asteroid when one day the auto defense system blue screens while you're playing a game...

CONTROLS

Arrow keys - Move

Spacebar - Fire/Interact

Brackets - Cycle through the inventory

CREDITSSoftware

Godot, GraphicsGale, paint.net
